TopicTitle: Mods No Longer Function After 1.3 Update

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

I just started to get back in to ksp after some time and noticed that after the 1.3 patch, mods have ceased to function. I've attempted to uninstall and reinstall the game, delete and replace mods, and start a new save. All of the mods I tried were up to date for 1.3. A few of the mods I tried were kerbal joint reinforcement, tweakscale, several of the near future mods, mechjeb, and kax. Any insight in to how I could get mods working again would be appreciated.

Thanks,

Daniel
